short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a very simple chrome extension to help you manage your emails!!!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension has 2 features right now you can add user groups so that it can label groups of users as well as keyword management where you can put in keywords and have it make a label for them and add it to every email which has that keyword in it within the email query range please email elonshagre@gmail.com with any feature ideas or bugs that i can fix.

open source is here 
https://github.com/EloniX-X/Eloni-s-Email-Organizer
